回答を記録しました！次のページに進んでください。: Your answer has been recorded! Please proceed to the next page.
あなたの1食あたりの目標栄養摂取量は: Your target nutrient intake per serving is
<b>レベル I</b>:<br> 生活の大部分が座位で、静的な活動が中心の場合:
Level I:
Most of the life is spent sitting, with static activities being the main focus
<b>レベル II</b>:<br> 座位中心の仕事だが、職場内での移動や立位で:
Level II:
Work is centered around sitting, but includes moving around the workplace, working or serving customers in a standing position, walking to work or shopping, housework, and light sports
<b>レベル III</b>:<br> 移動や立位の多い仕事への従事者、あるいは:
Level III:
Engaged in work that involves a lot of movement or standing, or have an active exercise habit in sports or leisure
一食分に使った量は何グラムですか？: How many grams for one serving?
<b>PFCバランスとは？</b><br>三大栄養素であるタンパク質、脂質、炭水:
What is PFC balance?
The balance of intake of the three major nutrients: protein, fat, and carbohydrates. It is recommended that protein intake should be 13-20%, fat intake 20-30%, and carbohydrate intake 50-65%.
* Targets for men and women aged 20-39.
Source: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare "Dietary Reference Intakes for Japanese (2020 version)"
TMR係数 (Total Material Requirement)とは, その: The Total Material Requirement (TMR) coefficient is the amount of mining activity required to provide that food
GWP (Global Warming Potential)とは, 温室効果ガス: Global Warming Potential (GWP) is the amount of greenhouse gas emissions
反応性窒素とは, 窒素酸化物の排出量です: Reactive nitrogen is the amount of nitrogen oxide emissions
